dt: {bc}a machine for beheading by means of a heavy blade that slides down in vertical guides
{bc}a shearing machine or instrument (such as a paper cutter) that in action resembles a guillotine

dt.t: The paper was trimmed on a {wi}guillotine{/wi}.

dt: {bc}closure by the imposition of a predetermined time limit on the consideration of specific sections of a bill or portions of other legislative business

shortdef: a machine for beheading by means of a heavy blade that slides down in vertical guides
a shearing machine or instrument (such as a paper cutter) that in action resembles a guillotine
closure by the imposition of a predetermined time limit on the consideration of specific sections of a bill or portions of other legislative business
